sentences.en: March 22 You will never disserve your relationship—nor anyone—by seeing more in another than they are showing you.
sentences.cn: 你可以看到比别人向你展现的更多，你这样做绝不会危及你的人际关系，也不会危及他人。

sentences.en: The scale of the landslide-debris flow was small, but the disserve was grievous.
sentences.cn: 滑坡泥石流规模小，但点多面广：漂木流危害严重。

sentences.en: Varroa mite is one of the most harmful vermin that disserve the beekeeping in the worldwide.
sentences.cn: 大蜂螨是危害世界养蜂业最为严重的害虫之一。
